name: Mayfly (RandyLarson)
description:
To the mayfly, the mortal coil is always near its end, but the the imperative of immortality must be addressed first. Accumulate health to transition to your final form while staying clear of dangers and the sands of time. Then couple and throw your genetics down the well of time.

Game Controls:

  • L-Shift -- press and hold to propel
  • Mouse -- you'll track toward the mouse's location.

Game Notes:

  • Different dots provide different benefits (food, or added time)
